languages.text: "Поднимай на бой народ, {name}, и объяви войну во всеуслышание. Скажи людям, что еретики прячутся среди них, и миллионы преданных сотрут в порошок тысячи изменников. Даргонус да очистит себя сам!"

"{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"
languages.original_text: "Поднимай на бой народ, {name}, и объяви войну во всеуслышание. Скажи людям, что еретики прячутся среди них, и миллионы преданных сотрут в порошок тысячи изменников. Даргонус да очистит себя сам!"

traits.locale_text: "{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to a powder. May Dargonus cleanse itself of the filth!"

"{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to a powder. May Dargonus cleanse itself of the filth!"

"{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"

"{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"

"{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"

"{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"

languages.text: “{name}，号召人民参加战斗，公开宣战。告诉人民，异端分子就藏在他们中间。成百上千万的忠诚臣民会自发碾碎那群叛徒。愿达戈努斯洗净它的污秽！”
languages.original_text: "{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"

traits.locale_text: “{name}，号召人民参加战斗，公开宣战。告诉人民，异端分子就藏在他们中间。成百上千万的忠诚臣民会自发碾碎那群叛徒。愿达戈努斯洗净它的污秽！”

languages.text: «{name}, alzad al pueblo a la batalla y proclamad públicamente la guerra. Decid al pueblo que los herejes se esconden entre ellos y que los millones de súbditos leales harán polvo a los miles de traidores. ¡Que Dargonus se limpie de esta inmundicia!».
languages.original_text: "{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"

traits.locale_text: «{name}, alzad al pueblo a la batalla y proclamad públicamente la guerra. Decid al pueblo que los herejes se esconden entre ellos y que los millones de súbditos leales harán polvo a los miles de traidores. ¡Que Dargonus se limpie de esta inmundicia!».

languages.text: 「{name}、民を戦いに駆り立て、公に戦争を宣言するのだ。民に自分達の中に、異端者が隠れていることを告げよ。何百万もの忠実な民が、何千もの裏切り者を粉々に粉砕するだろう。ダルゴナスがこの腐敗から浄化されるように！」
languages.original_text: "{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、民を戦いに駆り立て、公に戦争を宣言するのだ。民に自分達の中に、異端者が隠れていることを告げよ。何百万もの忠実な民が、何千もの裏切り者を粉々に粉砕するだろう。ダルゴナスがこの腐敗から浄化されるように！」

languages.text: « {name}, déclarez officiellement le début des hostilités et mobilisez la population. Dévoilez à tous que des hérétiques se cachent parmi nous et que nos millions de fidèles sujets écraseront sans peine ces quelques milliers de traîtres. Que Dargonus se purge elle-même de cette fange ! »
languages.original_text: "{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"

traits.locale_text: « {name}, déclarez officiellement le début des hostilités et mobilisez la population. Dévoilez à tous que des hérétiques se cachent parmi nous et que nos millions de fidèles sujets écraseront sans peine ces quelques milliers de traîtres. Que Dargonus se purge elle-même de cette fange ! »

languages.text: "{name}, bereitet die Leute auf den Kampf vor, und erklärt öffentlich den Krieg. Sagt ihnen, dass die Ketzer sich unter ihnen verstecken und die Millionen von treuen Untertanen die Tausenden von Verräter zu Staub zermahlen werden. Möge Dargonus sich selbst von diesem Abschaum befreien!"
languages.original_text: "{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"

traits.locale_text: "{name}, bereitet die Leute auf den Kampf vor, und erklärt öffentlich den Krieg. Sagt ihnen, dass die Ketzer sich unter ihnen verstecken und die Millionen von treuen Untertanen die Tausenden von Verräter zu Staub zermahlen werden. Möge Dargonus sich selbst von diesem Abschaum befreien!"

languages.text: "{name}, askerlerini çatışmaya sür ve açıkça savaş ilan et. İnsanlara aralarında kâfirlerin gizlendiğini ve sayısı milyonları bulan sadık tebaanın ellerinde binlerce hainin can vereceğini söyle. Dargonus, kendini bu pislikten arındırsın!"
languages.original_text: "{name}, raise the people to battle, and publicly proclaim war. Tell the people that the heretics are hiding among them and the millions of loyal subjects will grind the thousands of traitors to dust. May Dargonus cleanse itself of this filth!"
